name: MetforminAllergyIntolerance
title: Metformin AllergyIntolerance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED CT codes and RxNORM codes that could be returned by the FHIR AllergyIntolerance resource, and would indicate allergy or intolerance to Metformin),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE:),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNORM codes for individual medications that are Metformin, and various SNOMED CT codes that would indicate allergy or intolerance to Metformin as a class, or individual Metformin),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
